evaluations.name: Data length check
evaluations.description: Pass when GreenCh_data_length==IsoCh_data_length and the session is >15min

evaluations.name: Complete Synchronization Pulse
evaluations.description: Pass when Sync Pulse number equals data length, and when rising and falling give same lengths

evaluations.name: No NaN values in data
evaluations.description: Pass when no NaN values in the data

evaluations.description: Pass when CMOS dark floor is <265 in all channel
